summary: A collection of modder's resources which will be added onto as time goes on. Currently over 80 rugs in varying styles.
descriptionHtml:
I've been making little things here and there for projects, and decided to share them with the community. This is not a mod! Just a resource for use in mods.

Most of it is medieval themed, specifically inspired by The Witcher.

This will be added onto as time goes on. For now, this resource includes:

80+ Rugs in varying styles.
Wood, plaster, wallpaper, & stone walls
Wood, plaster, tile, & stone floors

So yeah. Use however you want. I'll be adding more stuff as I make it.

Credits:

Tamira for the rug resource.
author: Gearhog
